messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Pups under the shed- The continuing saga
messages.msgSnippet: Well, we have come to the conclusion that Joy is not bringing the pups out.. They are crawling out on thier own.. Evidently, she can t keep track of them...
messages.messageBody:
Well, we have come to the conclusion that Joy is not bringing the pups out..
They are crawling out on thier own.. Evidently, she can't keep track of
them... She may even still be having puppies. We had the one, trying to take
care of it.. Then, another one appeared outside a few feet from the workshop.
We just put it on the blade of a shovel and put it back beside her.. She
didn't reject it. So, we brought #1 wayward puppy back and put him with her
too. I do think, when she comes out, we will just have to get her and bring
her in the house and then get the puppies. Otherwise, she seems to keep
"losing" them. They are incredibly strong and mobile to be only hours old.

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
